Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Miniature "tulip" vase
Description: Carefully fashioned small "tulip" vase, placed in a child's burial (in those burials, all ceramic vessels are miniaturised). Wide flat base, S-shaped profile, tapered lip. The clay is very fine and shiny. The wide black rim is mounted by a greyish lip.
